entry.string: External URLs such as #(1) are not permitted in your User Account.
Your password must be #(1) characters long.
entry.translation: A jelszónak legalább #(1) karakter hosszúnak kell lennie

entry.string: There is an error in the supplied email address
That email address is either reserved or not allowed on this website
entry.translation: Ez az e-mail cím fenntartott vagy nem megengedett ezen a honlapon
